EmailTemplate.subject: Ready to start your UK Teaching Adventure?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for registering your interest in teaching in the UK. With a free flight, guaranteed teaching jobs across England and interviews with UK Principal’s before you have even left your home country, there is no better time to pack your bags & explore Europe during your school holidays.
Free flights Access to work in locations across the UK Continued Professional Development Interview with UK Principals in various locations across Australia
Competition Time!
We are currently running a competition to win a weekend trip for two to Dublin, Ireland.
When you register with Teach In, and complete a 1 year teaching contract, you will automatically be entered into the draw to win! Simple. You're already half way towards that pint of Guinness!
See what other Aussie teachers have to say about us!
Check out this short video to hear what other Australian teachers have to say about their UK teaching experience with Teach In.
Want to know more?
Our website is packed full of the all information you need if you’re considering teaching in the UK. Check out the links below:
International Teaching Where to live in the UK Types of work available UK Visa Information UK School Terms
Let’s talk!
We would love to discuss these opportunities with you in more detail.
Please get in touch with me on 0449790334 or email gemma.yates@teachin.co.uk
Looking forward to getting you on your way to teaching overseas!
Kind Regards,
Gemma
